cause.description:
Friends of TOMS is 501(c)(3) non profit organization dedicated to mobilizing, connecting, and empowering individuals who want to give further aid to the communities served by the TOMS One for One mission.
1. Mobilize: Create avenues for individuals to volunteer and experience the One for One mission in action by participating in a Shoe Drop.
2. Connect: Connect action-motivated individuals to the additional needs of communities TOMS Shoes supports.
3. Empower: Foster creativity and initiative amongst all Friends of TOMS to inspire and perform good works in their own communities.
cause.mission: Friends of TOMS, a partner of TOMS Shoes, Inc., mobilizes, connects, and empowers individuals who want to further support the TOMS Shoes One for One movement.
cause.name: Friends of TOMS
